name: Through the Closet Door
description:
This game was made in one week for Brackey's Game Jam

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You wake up as you hear a chirp and find a spirit is in your room and is requesting your help

Experience the atmospheric worlds which all are accessed through your closet door

Uncover the secret that this spirit is hiding to help it along with yourself

Adventure through this walking simulator and immerse yourself in the beauty of the unknown

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All assets and themes were originally created except for Ambient Soundtrack and Undelivered by Ketsa
